CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 税；税款；税金；负担；重负；苛捐杂税；征税额
使应尽义务；使负重荷；对…施加负担；使负重担；使大伤脑筋；耗费；消耗资源；繁重地索取；过度使用；指责；批评；[法]审定

pos_mean_info_list.mean: [税收] 可课税性；可征税性

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，指用各种不同方法向个人或单位征收所得税、房地产税等各种税款。侧重实际征收金钱。
指一般情况下，征收房地产税、罚款或其它费用。
指在决定个别案件中的处罚或罚款，尤指政府征收某种税收的决定。

word_group.brief_definition: 税收政策；税法政策；赋税政策
营业税；销售税；销售税收
税收抵免；(尤指政府向有子女或低收入者提供的）补助金

bilingual.source: Business income tax is a tax that companies must pay.
bilingual.target: 企业所得税是公司必须支付的一种税。

bilingual.source: The total cost is fifty dollars plus tax.
bilingual.target: 总费用是五十美元加税。

bilingual.source: Sales tax is usually collected by the seller.
bilingual.target: 销售税通常由卖家收取。

bilingual.source: The senator opposes the proposed tax increase.
bilingual.target: 参议员反对提议的增税。

bilingual.source: She filed her tax return before the deadline.
bilingual.target: 她在截止日期前提交了税表。

bilingual.source: You need to pay sales tax when you buy goods.
bilingual.target: 购买商品时需要支付销售税。

bilingual.source: The government levied a new tax on luxury goods.
bilingual.target: 政府征收了一项新的奢侈品税。

bilingual.source: The price of this item does not include sales tax.
bilingual.target: 这件商品的价格不包括销售税。

bilingual.source: A specific duty can make tax revenue more stable.
bilingual.target: 从量税可以使税收收入更加稳定。

bilingual.source: Small businesses also need to pay business income tax.
bilingual.target: 小企业也需要缴纳企业所得税。

yingyinNormal.en: For what? Hurting your feelings? Felony tax evasion.
yingyinNormal.zh: 理由呢？伤害你的感情吗？偷税漏税。

yingyinNormal.en: My expenses account for 46.9% of my after-tax income.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的日常开支占我税后收入的46.9%。

yingyinNormal.en: You're supposed to double the tax. Not double the tax of Romania.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把税乘以二，不是把罗马尼亚的税收乘以二。

yingyinNormal.en: Anyway, according to your tax forms, you reported, let me see here, zero!
yingyinNormal.zh: 总而言之，在你的税务报表上，你申报了，让我看看，零元的税！

yingyinNormal.en: And that you do not believe voting should be tied with a person's tax bracket. What if I don't believe that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 还要说你并不认为投票权应与个人税级挂钩。如果我不干呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Now, at the moment, 44 cents of every tax dollar goes to pay for these programs. By 2030, it'll be over half, 62 cents.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在呢？每一元的税中有44美分流向了这些项目，到2030年，就将超过一半，62美分。

yingyinNormal.en: Like, well, I got rid of a couple husbands, now I'm gonna get rid of a mortgage, some maintenance, the tchotchskes, the homeowner's insurance, the property tax, the plumbing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 比如我摆脱掉了好几个丈夫，现在我马上又可以摆脱房贷赡养费，和一些细枝末节的费用房屋保险，财产税，管道维护费。

yingyinNormal.en: And if you don't have a new friend by 9:00 tomorrow, as natural as flowers in the springtime, well, then maybe Leonard, the income tax attorney in Mommy's office, he's gonna do just a little bit of research into their family's paperwork and see if there're any inconsistencies.
yingyinNormal.zh: 接着如果明天早上九点之前你还不能像春暖花开那样自然而然地有一个新朋友，那么妈妈办公室里的所得税律师，伦纳德，就会对他们家的相关文件做一些小调查，看看有没有什么前后矛盾的地。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course, but the main problem is a simple one: tax.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，不过最主要的问题很简单：遗产税。

yingyinNormal.en: Odds are, you'll qualify for tax credits to help you afford it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很可能,你符合税收减免的条件,可以帮助你负担起这一支出。

yingyinNormal.en: As a tax payer I'd like to lodge a complaint as a matter of fact.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上作为纳税人，我要投诉。

yingyinNormal.en: We expanded grants and college tax credits for students and families.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们扩大了奖学金发放范围，为学生和其家庭提供更多的大学税收减免。

yingyinNormal.en: I know he has an open mind on our tax burden. He would love that. Great.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道他在我们税收负担上还是开放的。他会想跟你见面的。很好。

yingyinNormal.en: So instead they should spend now and tax later when everyone's happy to pay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因此政府现在正应该要增加支出，要收税的话就等到人们乐意时再说。

yingyinNormal.en: Though making people happy to pay tax was something even Keynes didn't solve.
yingyinNormal.zh: 即使让人们乐意缴税这件事对凯因斯来说也是不可能的任务。

yingyinNormal.en: I know. Because they wouldn't give a tax credit unless entry-level wages were higher.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道。因为他们不答应税收抵免除非最低工资标准提高。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't have to be a lonely hunter anymore. Today I can hunt for tax exemptions. I'm gonna be an actuary.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不用再孤单地追捕狩猎了，我可以追捕逃税的人，我要做精算师。

yingyinNormal.en: From opulent malls to the bustling markets of Temple Street and Ladies Street, tax-free Hong Kong is heaven bargain hunters.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从奢华的太古广场到大众化的庙街和女人街，都是购物的热点，而且香港的免税措施是精打细算人士的天堂。

yingyinNormal.en: The tax people have had a cancellation, so they can see us on Wednesday at noon. But I think we should go up tomorrow. I wouldn't like to risk being late.
yingyinNormal.zh: 税务局的人取消了一个会面，这样就可以在周三中午见我们，但我想明天就出发，我不想迟到。

yingyinNormal.en: Building new roads and bridges creates jobs. Growing our exports creates jobs. Reforming our outdated tax system and our broken immigration system creates jobs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 建设新的道路和桥梁来创造就业岗位，提高我们的出口创造就业岗位，改革我们过时的纳税系统和我们支离破碎的移民体系来创造就业岗位。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 税收政策；税法政策；赋税政策
营业税；销售税；销售税收

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 对…征税过重；使在力量、能力等方面承受过重压力

sense_info_list.en: impose a tax on someone or something

examination_example.sentence: In other words, they all share a view that the international <highlight>tax</highlight> system has failed to keep up with the current economy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 换句话说，他们都认为国际税收体系跟不上当前的经济。

examination_example.sentence: Last Thursday, the French Senate passed a digital services <highlight>tax</highlight>, which would impose an entirely new <highlight>tax</highlight> on large multinationals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上周四，法国参议院通过了一项数字服务税，将对大型跨国公司征收一种全新的税。

examination_example.sentence: Sellers that use eBay and Etsy, which provide platforms for smaller sellers, also haven't been collecting sales <highlight>tax</highlight> nationwide.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 使用为小卖家提供平台的易贝和Etsy的卖家也没有在全国范围内被征收销售税。

word_usage.usage: tax作动词时，为及物动词，其后可接名词或者代词，如：tax the rich 向富人征税。
tax作名词，表示”对……的税”时，其后常与on sth.连用，如：a tax on cigarettes 香烟税。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: impose a tax on someone or something

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>tax</highlight> is unlikely to add much to its revenue.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项税收不太可能增加财政收入。

examination_example.sentence: Tourists will have to pay a <highlight>tax</highlight> to visit Scotland.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 游客去苏格兰旅游必须交税。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: impose a tax on someone or something

examination_example.sentence: Most importantly, it is against the law. So we will side with the majority of the people of Philadelphia who oppose this <highlight>tax</highlight> and take legal action to stop it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最重要的是，这项征税是违法的。因此，我们将站在反对这项征税的大多数费城人民一边，并采取法律行动来阻止它征税。

examination_example.sentence: Public health groups applauded the approved <highlight>tax</highlight> as a step toward fixing certain lasting health issues that plague Americans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公共卫生组织对批准的这项征税法案表示赞赏，认为这是解决长期困扰美国人的某些健康问题迈出的一步。

examination_example.sentence: The ads criticized the measure, characterizing it as a "grocery <highlight>tax</highlight>".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 广告批评了这项措施，称其为“杂货税”。

examination_example.sentence: The fifth largest city in the US passed a significant soda <highlight>tax</highlight> proposal that will levy (征税) 1.5cents per liquid ounce on distributors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国第五大城市通过了一项意义重大的汽水税提案，该提案将对经销商征收每液体盎司1.5美分的税。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>tax</highlight> will apply to regular and diet sodas, as well as other drinks with added sugar, such as Gatorade and iced teas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项赋税不仅适用于佳得乐、冰茶等其他含糖饮料，也适用于常规汽水及无糖汽水。

examination_example.sentence: Until now, the only city to successfully pass and implement a soda <highlight>tax</highlight> was Berkeley, California, in 2014.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到目前为止，唯一成功通过并实施汽水税的城市只有加州的伯克利，时间是在2014年。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: There are plenty of other benefits, too; it doesn't charge city <highlight>tax</highlight>; it also has free Wi-Fi in every room.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 还有很多其他的好处；它不收城市税；每间客房都有免费Wi-Fi。

examination_example.sentence: My life as a <highlight>tax</highlight>-paying employed person began in middle school, when, for three whole days, I worked in a baking factory.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我作为纳税雇员的生活始于中学，当时我在一家烘焙工厂工作了整整三天。
